get_meteorite_count <- function(df_meteorites, input_year){
  
  meteorite_number <- df_meteorites %>%
    filter(year == input_year) %>% 
    group_by(year) %>% 
    summarise(meteorite_count = n()) %>% 
    pull()
    
  if (meteorite_number >= 1){
    return(str_c(\In\"
there were no meteorites that year\")
